00028 #ifndef __OgreWindowEventUtils_H__
00029 #define __OgreWindowEventUtils_H__
00030

00032 #include "OgrePlatform.h"
00033 
00034 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32
00035 #  define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
00036 #  if !defined(NOMINMAX) && defined(_MSC_VER)
00037 #   define NOMINMAX // required to stop windows.h messing up std::min
00038 #  endif
00039 #  include <windows.h>
00040 #elif OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_APPLE
00041 #  include <Carbon/Carbon.h>
00042 #endif

00044

00046 namespace Ogre
00047 {
00058     class _OgreExport WindowEventListener
00059     {
00060     public:
00061         virtual ~WindowEventListener() {}
00062 
00069         virtual void windowMoved(RenderWindow* rw)
00070                 { (void)rw; }
00071 
00078         virtual void windowResized(RenderWindow* rw)
00079                 { (void)rw; }
00080 
00088         virtual bool windowClosing(RenderWindow* rw)
00089         { (void)rw; return true; }
00090 
00101         virtual void windowClosed(RenderWindow* rw)
00102                 { (void)rw; }
00103 
00110         virtual void windowFocusChange(RenderWindow* rw)
00111                 { (void)rw; }
00112     };
00113 
00118     class _OgreExport WindowEventUtilities
00119     {
00120     public:
00126         static void messagePump();
00127 
00138         static void addWindowEventListener( RenderWindow* window, WindowEventListener* listener );
00139 
00148         static void removeWindowEventListener( RenderWindow* window, WindowEventListener* listener );
00149 
00157         static void _addRenderWindow(RenderWindow* window);
00158 
00166         static void _removeRenderWindow(RenderWindow* window);
00167 
00168 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32
00170         static LRESULT CALLBACK _WndProc(HWND hWnd, UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam);
00171 #elif OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_APPLE && !defined __OBJC__
00173         static OSStatus _CarbonWindowHandler(EventHandlerCallRef nextHandler, EventRef event, void* wnd);
00174 #endif
00175 
00176         //These are public only so GLXProc can access them without adding Xlib headers header
00177         typedef multimap<RenderWindow*, WindowEventListener*>::type WindowEventListeners;
00178         static WindowEventListeners _msListeners;
00179 
00180         typedef vector<RenderWindow*>::type Windows;
00181         static Windows _msWindows;
00182     };
